entries.title: The best video games of 2022
entries.description: From ‘Elden Ring’ to 'God of War Ragnarok' to even Wordle, 2022 was a great year for games. Here’s The Washington Post's list of the very best.

entries.title: Elon Musk uses QAnon tactic in criticizing former Twitter safety chief
entries.description: Musk used a misleading tweet to imply over the weekend that Twitter's former trust and safety head had been lax about pursuing reports of child porn on the site.

entries.title: Cringe quiz: Are you fluent in Gen-Z office speak?
entries.description: Take our quiz to find out how well you understand emojis, slang and reactions that your Generation Z colleagues use.

entries.title: Gen Z came to ‘slay.’ Their bosses don’t know what that means.
entries.description: Gen Z’s use of emojis, slang and punctuation is confusing older colleagues as workplace communications are increasingly online.
